website_summaries.verdict: An efficient utensil that requires a bit of TLC to remain functional.
pros: Spins greens rapidly and dries them completely
cons: Although "dishwasher safe," this spinner has been known to warp in the dishwasher

customer_reviews.title: This thing rules!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. She loves the brake feature and the fact that it doesn't slip while you are turning the crank. I guess our old crappy one did this all the time. Which, as I recall, the old one was very flimsy. This one is very solid and even withstands my brutish dumb-assery. It's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bolt

customer_reviews.title: I don't consider this a safe product!
customer_reviews.text: After 3 years of use maybe 2-3 a month the top is shredding. Since it's green I have no idea how long this may have been happening or if it got into my food. I would think nearly $30 to dry your lettuce you wouldn't have to worry about getting plastic in your food!
customer_reviews.author: nestaway

customer_reviews.title: Winner Winner salad dinner!
customer_reviews.text: I've had 3 spinners in the past that (OXO and others) , although they did their job, the engineering was not conducive to long term use. This spinner's design is well thought out and the construction seems durable. The side spinning handle is easy to use and the salad comes out dry enough for me. Hope fully will last a long time..
customer_reviews.author: Dak Tirque

customer_reviews.title: but the inner tray is an excellent pasta strainer and the outer bowl is great for ...
customer_reviews.text: Almost 2 years since ordering this and I am still using it almost daily. I use it to spin my salads, but the inner tray is an excellent pasta strainer and the outer bowl is great for serving salads. With this plastic type though, I can see it completely shattering if you drop it. I've never dropped mine but something about the plastic construction makes me more careful with it. This thing is great. I've given it lots of work in the past almost 2 years and I have zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Was great when it worked.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great when it worked. Unfortunately this wasn't for very long. After dismantling the spinner and looking at the gearing inside I can see why it has troubles. In my case the mechanism used to engage the spinner stays collapsed and doesn't spread out to catch the teeth to make it spin. I can actually get it to work if I go back and forth from counter clockwise to clockwise with a short 1/8 revolution motion. It is quite a workout but at least I can get it going. I may just open it up and superglue the catch mechanism so that it just always spins.
customer_reviews.author: T. B.

customer_reviews.title: Makes salads prep so much easier!
customer_reviews.text: I think this salad spinner is one of the best out there. It's easy to use, easy to clean and gets the job done pronto! The only thing that is a negative is that it takes up a lot of space on the shelf. I have a small kitchen with limited shelving, but I make room for this salad spinner....it's that useful! I wouldn't want to give it up!
customer_reviews.author: SandraJ

customer_reviews.title: My favorite salad spinner!
customer_reviews.text: This salad spinner looks great and is very solidly built! It is large in size, so if you're looking for something small to make individual salads or salads for two, this will be way more than you need. Our family of four eats a lot of salad and we needed something to fit a whole head of lettuce (and then some) at a time. This fits the bill! We store the lettuce in this container in the fridge and it keeps the lettuce very fresh and crisp for far longer than our old spinner did. It does take up quite a bit of room in the fridge as well, but we use it so much that we don't mind.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: This is the salad spinner you want!
customer_reviews.text: Love this salad spinner. So easy and comfortable to use. Large capacity. After you spin your lettuce, dry the bowl, and serve your salad in the bowl. Wish I would have purchased this a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A. Fannin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to use, perfect spinner.
customer_reviews.text: This salad spinner is great: it is strong and sturdy, and it doesn't have that annoying center post that some spinners have. The handel is easy to crank. The best salad spinner we've had--it has lasted us for 3 years so far, and will last longer. I ordered one for my mother for Christmas. We use the spinner at least once a day, for lettuce, as well as when I am washing fresh herbs, berries, or other delicate produce that needs washing and drying.
customer_reviews.author: Piky

customer_reviews.title: Not so sure it is space saving.
customer_reviews.text: Have had a number of salad spinners in the past that were significantly smaller than this one. However this product does a great job. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Cali-kaneTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: It broke after 3 months use.
customer_reviews.text: I turn the crank & turn the crank & nothing spins. I even opened up the spinner part & tried to put it back together again. Now sometimes it spins, sometimes it don't. If the lettuce is too wet, it's too heavy and that breaks the spinner parts.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Cohen

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best. One of the things I like most is ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had 3 different salad spinners. This is by far the best. One of the things I like most is that there is no center post. In addition you only have to turn the handle, not push down on a plunger. Well worth the money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rae R. Newton

customer_reviews.title: One smooth spinner!
customer_reviews.text: Really, really glad I chose this spinner. I bought the larger of the two sizes offered. It's smooth, quiet, stays put on the counter by its little rubber feet. Easy to clean and store. I use the 'break' button even though I made fun of a salad spinner even needing one. This spinner can put some speed on as it's so easy to use and the stop button is necessary unless you have all the time to wait for it.
customer_reviews.author: DE

customer_reviews.title: It dries lettuce - yay
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted a salad spinner, and this one did not disappoint. It works and there's not much to it. It's easy to clean - lid comes off, green basket comes out which gets washed and then the bowl gets washed. The fact that the handle folds down like it does is a nice way to save space. The best thing about it is that it actually dries the lettuce, which is exactly what I needed in this product. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny O.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this spinner!
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST salad spinner I have ever owned. The handle spins the bowl with an easy gliding motion, and stays still when you release it. My hand resting lightly on the top stabilizes it as it spins, though it is pretty stable without that. It is quiet and dries greens very effectively - a lot of water left in the bowl! Large enough to hold two normal bunches of stripped kale, but still stores easily in my lower kitchen cabinet. Handle can be removed and stored inside the bowl, but I haven't found that necessary. I love this spinner. So glad my cat broke the old one by knocking it on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: TDupree

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best salad spinner ever
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best salad spinner ever. I have two of these. The hand crank is far superior to the pump salad spinners, requiring very little effort for a dry bed of lettuce. This product is also super super cute and sturdy. All around one of my favorite kitchen products (I have two, a smaller one and a larger one).
customer_reviews.author: DrowsyKitten

customer_reviews.title: Essential in a household that eats salads
customer_reviews.text: No more pillow case centrifuges for me! Enjoying my Culina 5-qt salad spinner. Used daily, holds up well. Enough with the comparisons...you need a 5-qt, if not larger. Cut the crap, buy THIS one, wash and spin-dry your red-leaf, make that salad, treat your body well. That is all...
customer_reviews.author: Sonny Cahill

customer_reviews.title: I am a huge fan of this easy to use and effective salad spinner
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of this easy to use and effective salad spinner. The design is excellent and strikes a good balance in terms of functionality and looks. The arm appears to fold back when not in use but I've not mastered that and just leave it as pictured. The base has wide, rubber feet that keep the spinner secure on a countertop and the ingenious brake stops the spinner on a dime. This is a very good product at an excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Well done.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Somewhat difficult to clean but all such spinners I've used have been. Crank handle drive is far superior to the Zyliss spinner that got dropped (and cracked).
customer_reviews.author: Madbaldman

customer_reviews.title: the size and non invasive top is great. When I get salad I eat a rather ...
customer_reviews.text: the size and non invasive top is great. When I get salad I eat a rather large portion at a time, and the medium OXO one simply did not hold enough. overall this design is much better. The only down side is the little knob can pull out a little too easily on the crank arm. So when I really get it going fast if I am not paying attention I rip it out of the arm. Not terrible, just inconvenient. I'd give it 5 if that was more secure. otherwise it;s fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: just like me! It's easy to use and does a ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It's stylish and colorful, just like me! It's easy to use and does a great job with all kinds of greens. So far I've used it for kale, spinach and sugar snap peas. Cons: Finding a place to keep it when done with it, the base clear plastic seems low quality and like it won't survive a run in the dishwasher, best handwash it for now. It would be nice if it had a lid to fit on the lower water catch base to use it as a bowl to store the salad in the fridge if not consuming right away.
customer_reviews.author: Adrock Holzer

customer_reviews.title: I feel like if I were to drop it mistakenly once
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Is fairly bulky, but that's not the product's fault. The whole thing feels a little flimsy, especially the clear, outside bowl. I feel like if I were to drop it mistakenly once, the whole thing would crack. But, you get what you pay for. It's very inexpensive. Does the job, works well, looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best Salad Spinner I have ever owned, and I have owned a few.
customer_reviews.text: Hands down so far the best Salad spinner I have owned. Glad I went through all the reviews. Lots of room, spins at a great speed of which you can control through the crank. Won't wobble like many do, very sturdy and does not slide or move around when your using it. Also the clear bowl makes for a handy serving bowl if you are inclined to use it like that.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: SORRY BUT THIS THING IS CRAP, I put a few leaves of Romain Lettuce. Left the lettuce very wet. I used the stupid thing for a longer time then expected. My husband asked me if I was making Butter !! LOL. I will continue to dry the lettuce the same old way I have for years. PAPER TOWELS. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbra

customer_reviews.title: Great Salad Spinner!
customer_reviews.text: I make a lot of salads for dinners. This spinner I have found to be a great addition to my kitchen utensils. It does a really good job of drying the lettuce so you don't end up diluting your salad dressing or end up with a pool of water on the bottom. Well made and sturdy and I'm sure it will last for years to come. It's the best salad spinner that I've used or even seen in the stores.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J.

customer_reviews.title: Great salad spinner, use it almost daily with great success.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great salad spinner. Good size, mechanisms, and results! Drys my green with a few spins. Works much better than a few of the other models I tried.
customer_reviews.author: HallaDurg

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this spinner after doing some research. Unfortunately, it broke after 4 months of use. It worked well at the beginning but not longer spins when you crank the handle. Dissapointed that it had such a short life.
customer_reviews.author: schoolbooks

customer_reviews.title: Nice Salad Spinner
customer_reviews.text: I have been using mine for a couple of weeks now. I really like the design as it makes it easier to keep the bowl secure while spinning the lettuce. I went with the larger size which is perfect for my family of 3.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Fine until it broke
customer_reviews.text: I loved this salad spinner until it broke 3 months after I purchased it (I probably only used it 5-6 times in those months). I would use it again but it's not returnable. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: Good size and quality
customer_reviews.text: This has worked very well. I don't have much kitchen space but it is the right size to dry lettuce for a big salad to feed a few people or for lots of lettuce wraps. I am glad I didn't buy the smaller size. This size allows me to wash the leaves better before I dry them. I have used it quite a bit and it seems it will last for a while.
customer_reviews.author: my-two-cents

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works so much better than the pull cord one I had. With less effort. After washing and spinning my salad, I wash out the bowl and dry it, then put the salad in the bowl, add my other dry ingredients and serve directly from the bowl. Wish the company would provide a snap on lid for transporting the salad to church dinners and other events
customer_reviews.author: England

customer_reviews.title: Great spinner that allows you to stop spinning at anytime.
customer_reviews.text: Great spinner. It was a brake button you can push to stop the inside spinner bowl from spinning. I also like that the handle requires minimal winding. The spinner I had before this was a push top and you had to wait for the bowl to stop spinning before you could re-open it. I have no complaints with this spinner
customer_reviews.author: CAM

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use and clean. It doesn't slide around and the handle is easy to turn. It drains the salad well. I didn't give it 5 stars because I've only used it twice so I don't know how well it will hold up. So far I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chi

customer_reviews.title: BEST SALAD SPINNER EVER!
customer_reviews.text: this is the best salad spinner ever! This is built so well. We dump in the salad stuff, spin it, eat it and store the left overs in the same container. I don't think you can ever break this even if you tried. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Bloyer

customer_reviews.title: Fast Spinner
customer_reviews.text: Well made spinner with brake, very easy to use and clean. The only change I would like is a shorter handle, as the crank has too much swing and forces your arm into a wide unnatural arc to move the handle. They apparently made the handle long to decrease the effort needed to turn it, but now there is almost no effort and too much arm movement in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: J. E. Tomczyk

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for a whole head of lettuce
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use salad spinner - dries lettuce with just a few spins. The pieces all seem well made and the stop button makes it quick to spin and go. You can fit a whole head of chopped lettuce in here. After spinning and dumping the water out the clear bowl, it works well to serve the lettuce in. I'm not sure how this qualifies as space saving, as it is quite large, but if you are looking for a salad spinner that will fit a bunch of greens, this one is great.
customer_reviews.author: J&K

customer_reviews.title: This Is My Second One
customer_reviews.text: Good product, I had one before and last at least 5-6 years.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Breaks after a few months
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for about 3 months, I loved it! Then with no warning it broke.... not the handle or the basket, it just wouldn't spin. My husband checked the gears and everything... We had to throw it away. Complete bummer.
customer_reviews.author: JulesBules

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this 5 quart salad spinner
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this 5 quart salad spinner. Its large enough to hold about 1-1/2 heads of fresh romaine. Turning the handle on this spinner is much, more easier to use than the pull string spinner I previously owned. It also gets out more water than any pull string spinner I've used. Buy it, its great! You can't go wrong with this. Customer service is top notch too. I had a question about something, they responded immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Paud

customer_reviews.title: Great salad spinner for a great price ($14
customer_reviews.text: Great salad spinner for a great price ($14.99). It's sturdy, solid and dries vegetables really well. It doesn't come with instructions so I was a little worried as I jammed the handle into the lid but it snapped into place fine and it works like a charm. Don't plan to wash it in the dishwasher, so I can't speak to how well it handles that.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Newsom

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect, except the Handle does not stay in port
customer_reviews.text: This spins very fast when it works. It is easy to clean up. The handle has begun to pop out during use, so that drops my rating from a 5 star to a 2 star.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart H

customer_reviews.title: love this spinner
customer_reviews.text: This salad spinner is the nicest one I have ever owned and used. I particularly like the side arm crank. It is very easy and comfortable to use. The basket fits 2 large heads of green leaf lettuce or three mediums ones. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Luther

customer_reviews.title: This one is easier for her to use and is a really good size for what we need
customer_reviews.text: My wife really loves it. We had a similar one and it broke. I was looking online and found this one after comparing so many others. This one is easier for her to use and is a really good size for what we need. I'm glad I found it and chose it. One for the win column!
customer_reviews.author: Charles  Olivarez

customer_reviews.title: Love this spinner!
customer_reviews.text: Great salad spinner. Really like the turning handle compared to the push levers on other spinners. Easier to control and the spinning function seems more effective. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Campmom

customer_reviews.title: This salad spinner works great. The handle takes a minimum of effort to ...
customer_reviews.text: This salad spinner works great. The handle takes a minimum of effort to get the bowl up to high speed. The large capacity lets you spin enough lettuce to feed a party (or just pre-wash all your lettuce). The brake works well. The only thing I have noticed is that it tends to get a pronounced wobble at high speeds, but that could be because I still havent found a good space on my counter to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Very effective gadget
customer_reviews.text: A good capacity, well-built spinner that works easily and very effectively. Basket is sturdy but not brittle plastic that holds up to an accidental drop. Brake works well and lettuce comes out almost completely dry. A vast improvement over my old Copco.
customer_reviews.author: Cantonman

customer_reviews.title: Love the Size!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and big. Holds an entire head of lettuce. Well balanced and easy to use. Easy to clean up. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: M. L. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I loved this salad spinner at first
customer_reviews.text: I loved this salad spinner at first. My $3 salad spinner I had previously lasted 10 years. This one, two months. Just after the return window the white center part no longer catches on the gear teeth and the whole vat of plastic goes in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works good, works fast
customer_reviews.text: This thing spins like crazy. It is sometimes a little difficult to sit the basket exactly where it goes, but not that big a deal. It would also be nice if this unit had a small drain hole, instead of having to take out the basket each time to dump excess water. I usually fill basket with my veggies and water, remove basket, dump water and spin 1-2 more times for the excess water remove.
customer_reviews.author: amazon12

customer_reviews.title: It works pretty well, but it's not any more space saving ...
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty well, but it's not any more space saving then my other salad spinner because it narrower, but taller than my regular one.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa D.

customer_reviews.title: Spin! Spin! Spin!
customer_reviews.text: What is there to say? - Simple to put together -Spins fast -top spinner lid comes off, inner lid becomes well-- a lid -- it spins really well (oh said that already) -- it's a pretty color --enough room to hold salad for 4+ serving at least hmmm ... yummy salads??!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Drake

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but not "space saving"
customer_reviews.text: Only removed one star because it is not space saving... It's big enough to hold three chopped heads of romaine lettuce, which is awesome, but it's so big we store it on top of the fridge instead of under the cabinet like I had planned. Great spinner, sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: ENSeeber

customer_reviews.title: Was good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I have had mine for a little over a year and it broke during normal use (spinner no longer works). Was good while it lasted, but I hoped for it to last longer than that!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really so easy to turn. It is the right size for a large salad and very sturdy. I think I have picked the best of all salad spinners and I have had a few.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: I like it better than my other spinner.
customer_reviews.text: I like this much better than my other spinner - the one with a pull cord - because it spins in one direction. I guess I should do a test and see if one dries better than the other... It takes up a lot more room, though, because of the domed top. I love the color.
customer_reviews.author: B. Healthy

customer_reviews.title: Nice salad spinner
customer_reviews.text: This thing is big enough to fit most of a head of romaine lettuce into without having to cut the leaves into smaller bits. The handle is easy to turn, and the whole mechanism makes very little noise. The brake button works relatively well. The unit is easy to take apart and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Knight

customer_reviews.title: Must have for every kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Really makes a difference in how the dressing clings to salads. In turn makes a difference in the salad altogether. Wouldn't live without one now. Amazing how much excess water comes off of the freshly washed produce. Really good quality, fast ship. The spinner stop was an unexpected bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn McRae

customer_reviews.title: husband loves this
customer_reviews.text: my husband loves this. I gave him a kidney in March and since then we have both been craving salads. he washes up everything in this as it is easy to use and does a great job. we had the one with the spinner on top, broke after about 5-6 times.NW
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Lovely salad spinner
customer_reviews.text: Nice design, easy to use and easy to clean. The overall design isn't huge so it doesn't take up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent spinner. Far better than the OXO that is ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent spinner. Far better than the OXO that is currently selling at #1. It will hold a full, decent-sized head of romaine and dry it well. If you want it super dry, you may want to spin it in two batches. Not sure about the "space saving" aspect. Yes, the handle comes off, but the handle doesn't take up much space. This is about an inch taller than any of my previous spinners, so I had to raise a cabinet shelf to fit this. Regardless, this may be the best spinner I have owned in terms of performance and quality. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kuhns

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good - handle really needs to be jammed into the mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: MrQPros

customer_reviews.title: Beats the others
customer_reviews.text: This is so much better than the spinners I had before. I like the sticky feet that keep it from sliding around. It has a great capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Keith W

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Much bigger than I was expecting so I'm glad I didn't go for the 7 QT one I was considering! Love the stop button to stop the spin quickly. Crank handle is very easy to use. Love how you can just use the clear bowl for serving the salad!
customer_reviews.author: Alison M.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Do not know how I live without it before. What a nice idea. Simple and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Make a salad or wash your bra
customer_reviews.text: Works great for salad but I use it for "handwashing" my underwire bras in. I'm not kidding - google it.
customer_reviews.author: ESFJ

customer_reviews.title: It wasn't any good and I haven't touched one since
customer_reviews.text: I used to own a hand me down salad spinner a long time ago. It wasn't any good and I haven't touched one since. Wow! How times have changed. I thought I would try one again and they're made much better. I did my research and decided upon this one. So far, so good. Seems to work great, gets the water out of the greens.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa O.

customer_reviews.title: Great product but a little big.
customer_reviews.text: Salad spinner works great! Easy to use, easy to clean up. I just wish it was a little smaller - takes up a lot of room on my counter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Ninja

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a salad-cleaning power house!
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a new salad spinner b/c my old one was one of the kind that used a pull-string, and that broke. I obviously like the handle because I know that I won't be able to break it, but I was surprised by how much more water spins out due to the extra strength I am able to use with it. And the design really maximizes the capacity of the bowl, while still being compact enough to store in a standard depth Ikea cabinet. Really pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Best spinner I’ve ever used, this really gets the water out
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Good salad spinner
customer_reviews.text: Very good salad spinner. Has rubber feet on the bottom to prevent sliding. Gets my salad completely dry. Removable basket is nice to wash the salad it and then spin it.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this spinner!!!!!!! Works excellent and is very durable!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: After just a few months is won't spin anymore. No support or returns.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: Its big. User friendly with the side arm rather than the top arms on others. It fell off the counter once and broke internally. Made with cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: bh

customer_reviews.title: the best spinner in the market
customer_reviews.text: well built and functioning, the best spinner in the market !
customer_reviews.author: Tennis

customer_reviews.title: This product is great! Who knew what I was missing out on ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! Who knew what I was missing out on for so long. Did not realize how much water was left on my lettuce after I cleaned it. Makes salads taste so crisp and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: g welch

customer_reviews.title: great salad dryer
customer_reviews.text: great salad dryer .. i was looking for one with a handle and found this one gotta say this thing is great and the bowl itself is pretty big i think its worth it buy it.. i like it also because it doesn't have that push button style on the top like most of the newer ones have these days
customer_reviews.author: BatmanGixxer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I like the sturdiness of this salad spinner. I like the crank on the side, instead of the top--better ergonomics. Holds a standard bunch of lettuce.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah G.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: Great salad spinner. Very stable and spins the water off very efficiently. The benefit of having an arm on the side to spin (as compared to the top arms or pushers on the top) is that you can hold the spinner very well with the other hand. Great design! This was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: mark van der linden

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: After several incorrect shipments from other vendors of Xtraordinary spinners, this unit came to my attention. I'm glad they shipped the wrong units previously (small instead of large) because this one works great, is better-constructed, and easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Finally I don't have to eat watery lettuce anymore. My Publix sprays the lettuce continually and it is soaking wet. This spinner works very well getting that water out of the lettuce.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy S. Alcorn

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty frustrating. The construction is nice but I want ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this. It spins but it doesn't get the water all off the lettuce leaves. I go through 3 spins that last a considerable time and still there is water on the leaves. It's pretty frustrating. The construction is nice but I want my lettuce dry.
customer_reviews.author: maura

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Am very impressed with design. This is my 3rd salad spinner, and believe it will be my last.
customer_reviews.author: akditchwitch

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it'd do the trick...but it doesn't
customer_reviews.text: It just does not work very well. You're better off just rinsing everything in the sink.
customer_reviews.author: N. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Said it was top rack DW safe, but warped after one wash
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Only used a few times but worked very well. Seems well built.
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: 21 month life span is poor
customer_reviews.text: Died after 21 months. Worked fine until then. 21 months is poor though. Stopped spinning. Never touched a dishwasher. Just died.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: Big and bulky to store anywhere in the cabinets. Works well though.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome- it's capacity is huge so I can wash a head of chopped lettuce, baby spinach, herbs, and baby kale all at once. It's spin is nice and smooth and the handle (the whole thing, really) is well designed.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiian Soul

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but is crazy bulky
customer_reviews.text: It works wonderfully, but is extremely bulky; probably takes up more space in my kitchen than anything else
customer_reviews.author: mrjeremiahross

customer_reviews.title: Easy for wife to use
customer_reviews.text: wife loves it after a push from top spinner was way too hard for her to work even when lowering it to a stool. She loves this spinner!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: robert j phillips

customer_reviews.title: Got it as a wedding registry gift and liked it so much
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a wedding registry gift and liked it so much! Great product, very durable, large, and works great. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: MHA

customer_reviews.title: gosh I love it, the quality is absolutely great
customer_reviews.text: I can't stop looking at it, gosh I love it, the quality is absolutely great. I really Love it. Haven't used it yet, but I think it'll be
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Pig.

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best we have had
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best we have had. I told my wife I am glad the one we had died. This gets the water out and the handle that spins it is effortless. Well balanced and good quality
customer_reviews.author: Trudy A Northover

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this!! Really helped with washing, drying and blanching my cabbage this week! It's good quality and stores well.
customer_reviews.author: Miss N. Warriner

customer_reviews.title: Clean and dry
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Spin a whole head of lettuce dry. The top makes it easy to hold and the stop button works great. USE the stop button or your food will fly out if you open it and it is still spinning.
customer_reviews.author: ET H-Town

customer_reviews.title: the one I received was cracked. I had to ...
customer_reviews.text: the one I received was cracked. I had to send it back. I order a different product. so, I never got to use this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tscurry

customer_reviews.title: Take it for a spin
customer_reviews.text: We have used this twice and the lettuce seems to keep crisper and we use more of it before it turns versus the whe head keeper that we had. The unit seems to work fine for us.
customer_reviews.author: E Chester

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love! First salad spinner & it works as expected. It's quite large! Makes salad prepping 100x easier.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Barton

customer_reviews.title: Drys my lettuce
customer_reviews.text: easy to spin and drys lettuce pretty quickly. There is even a button that you can hold to stop the spinning action. Would order again!
customer_reviews.author: APalmo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves this Salad Spinner and her sister, niece and everybody else
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Culina Space Saving Salad Spinner, 5-Quart
product_meta.description: Culina 5Qt. Large Salad Spinner is the fast, efficient, affordable, chic way to maintain a healthy routine and improve diet. Arugula, spinach, cabbage are as many possibilities to increase your daily salad intake and foster a long life! Keep salad-making quick, easy and fun with Culina 5 Qt. Salad Spinner whether a vegan, vegetarian or paleo diet best suits your appetite. Ergonomic design, robust features: Superior quality, robust construction, Culina 5Qt. Large Spinner is a durable, time-tested, resistant, spinning powerhouse, outfitted with a side hand crank discreet enough for easy storage, yet broad enough for a comfortable, non-slip grip, it's effortless to . Food Safe: Exercise caution, reduce germs and potential bacteria by washing raw vegetables thoroughly. Using Culina 5Qt. Salad Spinner, you will immediately see leftover dirt and other foreign residue wash off as they collect in the clear outer bowl. Removing excess water allows for food to be that much enjoyable, crispy clean, full of nutrients and tasteful rather soggy which besides looking unappealing and lacking in taste can ultimately deplete food of its essential minerals. Easy to Use: Simply fill up the basket with desired amount of salad, rinse, set back in the clear bowl, cover and with a simple, forceless turn of the ergonomically designed crank handle spin and dry your salad. Better Performance: Spins with impressive centrifugal force reminiscent of a drying spin cycle, capable of wringing water out of leafy greens in no time. Ideally, you'd want your salad to soak in the dressing for a delectable experience; that's not entirely guaranteed when using the underwhelming, poor-performing spinners currently flooding the market. In contrast, Culina 5 Qt. Large Salad Spinner is a top of the line spinner with an enviable price, accessible to all budgets.
feature_bullets: Robust, quality material, powerhouse. 3 parts: clear bowl, slotted basket/colander, tight fitted lid features instant stop spin brake button
Food Safe and Health Benefits: Removes excess water with fast spin centrifugal force, can reduce germs and potential bacteria
Accommodates large party, yet easy storage. Doubles as large fruit bowl, perfect for juicing prep and party presentation
Great alternative to eating out. Gift-ready in Sophisticated Clean Line Packaging
